# <code>math avg</code> for math

<div class='command-title'>Finds the average of a list of numbers or tables</div>

## Signature

```> math avg```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Get the average of a list of numbers
```shell
  > [-50 100.0 25] | math avg
```
